## Swirl Course Setup

1. Navigate to this [link](https://github.com/lindsaynhayes/introR2025/tree/main/swirl) to download the Swirl lesson file 1_R_Programming_Mod.swc

2.  In RStudio, install and load the swirl package

    `install.packages("swirl")`

    `library("swirl")`

3. Start Swirl by typing the following command

    `swirl()`


4. Once you have downloaded the file, in the console of RStudio run the following command and interactively choose the 1_R_Programming_Mod.swc file you just downloaded

    `install_course()`
